name: Domotic Simulator by Toolkitman
description:
THIS IS A COCO TRS 80 DOMOTIC PROGRAM IDEA EXAMPLE I HAVE DEVELOPED NOTHING LIKE ALEXA OR GOOGLE HOME BUT ADDING SOME SENSORS TO YOUR COCO IT WILL WORK ADJUSTING THE CODE WITH INPUT OUTPUT.

Open a menu with 4 device to choose by writing the conresponding first letter and pressing return,Music change everytime you press it. 

This is only a proof of concept do take it easy!

by

Matteo Trevisan "TOOLKITMAN"
